data.name: Amira
data.detailed_description:
Amira


Amira: A story driven hack and slash game that tells the story of a young girl, born in a fantasy-middle eastern world, where she does her best to help her family protecting their and maintaining their land, until one day when she learned that her life is prewritten for her as she fought monsters day in day out and protected her land now she begins her journey searching for acceptance and love in this world filled with traditions and monsters, and fighting to write her own life.

Amira lives in a middle eastern fantasy world, with what little care she had as a child, what little information and education she received as she grew she realized how little she knew about her surrounding world, but she knew one thing, she wanted to be helpful for those around her, to be needed and wanted, thus she begins exploring this world and helping those around her.

Features:

  • Discover A New World: filled with rules, laws and traditions, that change the lives of everyone from monsters and jinn to your own family in this fictional middle eastern fantasy world
  • Action Packed Battle: ruled by quick and responsive controls, easy to learn for new players, while offering a rich experience for advanced players, offering both ranged and melee combat over the course of multiple unique environments.
  • Grow Stronger And Help Others: through finding safe points which give you strength and memory fragments, that unlock new weapons, and special abilities while teaching you about the world.
  • Uncover The Secrets: rules and traditions of this world by solving puzzles leading you to a new path in the world.
  • Collect The Prayers: and use it as a soruce of your strength, to protect both yourself, and your land, from the monsters and jinn.

data.short_description: Amira: A story driven hack and slash about a girl born in a middle eastern-fantasy world filled with monsters and traditions, who finds by chance that her life is prewritten as she was protecting her family's land, thus she now fights for acceptance, love and writing her own life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Or Higher
  • Processor: I3 Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel built in Xeon E3-1200 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 Or Higher
  • Processor: I5 Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: I3 Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel built in Xeon E3-1200 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher
  • Processor: I5 Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
